info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 2:23PM EDT until September 07 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Henderson County in western North Carolina... South central Buncombe County in western North Carolina... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 222 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mills River, or 5 miles northwest of Hendersonville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Arden, Mills River, Fletcher, Etowah, Mountain Home, Laurel Park, Asheville Airport, Skyland, Forge Mountain, Horse Shoe, and Edneyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
